definition: to take upon oneself/to assume
picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at

sentences.english: Mr Tait also acted as the official photographer.
sentences.chinese: 泰特先生還擔當了官方攝影師的職責。

sentences.english: Tabb is the first woman to referee a world snooker championship final.
sentences.chinese: 塔普是第一位在斯諾克世錦賽決賽中擔當裁判的女性。

sentences.english: Always follow the party go, responsibility and play a future backbone of the nation.
sentences.chinese: 永遠跟黨走，擔當未來的責任和民族的脊樑。

sentences.english: WHO is the Secretariat for the International Coordinating Group for Yellow Fever Vaccine Provision (ICG).
sentences.chinese: 世衛組織擔當黃熱病疫苗供應國際協調小組的祕書處。

sentences.english: Use well-experienced practitioners to act at the top management level.
sentences.chinese: 使用經驗豐富的專業人員擔當高層管理角色。

sentences.english: It is the reward of our martyrs.
sentences.chinese: 是我們對先烈的報答，對歷史的擔當。

sentences.english: But Americans still want their commander-in-chief to take command.
sentences.chinese: 但是美國仍然希望他們的首長能擔當大局。

sentences.english: In other cases, some people can fulfill more than one role.
sentences.chinese: 在其他情況下，一些人可以擔當多個角色。

sentences.english: Spies use sex, intelligence, and the thrill of a secret life as bait.
sentences.chinese: 間諜運用美色與智慧，周旋其中，擔當魚餌。

sentences.english: Always follow the party go, bear the responsibility and national future backbone.
sentences.chinese: 永遠跟黨走，擔當未來的責任和民族的脊樑。

sentences.english: You serve as an executive at state-owned enterprises in steel and communications.
sentences.chinese: 你在分管鋼鐵和通信的國企擔當主管人員。

sentences.english: Polydextrose can act as a humectant in these kind of recipes.
sentences.chinese: 聚葡萄糖可以在這些配方中擔當一種保溼劑。

sentences.english: Too much praise is a weight.
His skills qualify him for the work.
sentences.chinese: 他的技能使他能擔當這項工作。

sentences.english: The black cow guide figure "Gako-chan" explains operation methods.
sentences.chinese: 擔當導遊的黑牛“亞牯”說明操作方法。

sentences.english: Were primordial methanogens up to the task?
sentences.chinese: 原始的產甲烷菌足以擔當這個重任嗎？

picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole

to shoulder (a burden)/to bear/to suffer (a disadvantage)
responsibility/blame/duty/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
to participate (in sth)
leading/dominant/prevailing/to lead/to direct/to dominate
active/energetic/vigorous/positive (outlook)/proactive
in the future/future/the future/CL:個|个[ge4]
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
duty/responsibility/obligation
independent/independence/to stand alone
team
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
